bookSourceGroup: 🔭 其他,🎊 常用,🎨 漫画
exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
function explore(title, url, num, num_1, bool) {
    style = '{\n    title: "' + title + '",\n    url: "' + url + '",\n    style:{\n      layout_flexGrow: ' + num + ',\n      layout_flexBasisPercent: ' + num_1 + ',\n      layout_wrapBefore: ' + bool + '\n    }\n  }';
    return style;
}
var exploreUrl = [];
title = [
    '排行',
    '更新'
];
var host = `{{Get('url')}}`;
url = [
    '`${host}/api/rank/0-0-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/latest/{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title[i], eval(url[i]), 1, 0.4, false));
}
title1 = [
    '韩国','完结','连载','更新',
    '日本','完结','连载','更新'
];
url1 = [
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-2-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-2-1-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-2-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-1-3-0-{{page}}`',
    '`${host}/api/classify/0-0-0-3-1-{{page}}`'
];
for (i in title1) {
    exploreUrl.push(explore(title1[i], eval(url1[i]), 1, 0.2, false));
}
var exploreUrlStr = '[' + exploreUrl.join(",") + ']';
exploreUrlStr;
</js>
header:
<js>
var Proxy = Map('代理：').split(",");
headers={
    "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/123.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36",
    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(Get('url') + "headers",JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);
</js>
loginUi:
[
  { name: "激活码：", type: "text" },
  { name: "代理：", type: "text" },
  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 更　　 新　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "update()"
  },
  { name: "  查看当前  ", type: "button", action: "look(0)" },
  { name: "   查看历史   ", type: "button", action: "look(1)" },
  { name: "  恢复默认  ", type: "button", action: "test(0)" },
  { name: "  繁体搜索  ", type: "button", action: "search_TC()" },
  { name: "   简繁转换   ", type: "button", action: "TC_to_SC()" },
  { name: "  目录整理  ", type: "button", action: "settle()" },

  { name: "                      ༺ˇ»`ʚ  点击切换源站  ɞ´«ˇ༻                     ", type: "button" },
  { name: "① 第一 ✈️", type: "button", action: "$(1)" },
  { name: " ② 第一 🐰 ", type: "button", action: "$(2)" },
  { name: "③ 第一 🐰", type: "button", action: "$(3)" },
  { name: "④ 第一 🐰", type: "button", action: "$(4)" },
  { name: " ⑤ 第一 🐰 ", type: "button", action: "$(5)" },
  { name: "⑥ 第一 🐰", type: "button", action: "$(6)" },

  {
    name: "            💡　　 源　　 站　　 打　　 印　　 💡            ",
    type: "button",
    action: "test()"
  }
]

ruleBookInfo.author: author
ruleBookInfo.init:
eval(String(source.loginUrl)); var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl)); var Option = { "method": "GET", "headers": Headers }; if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") { var J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var list = JSON.parse(result.match(/initIntroData\(\[(.*)\]\)/)[1]).data; var $2 = s1 => String(java.getElements(s1).text()); var $3 = s2 => String(J.select(s2).attr('src')); url = Get('url') + baseUrl.match(/\/comic.*/); s = $2('.sub_r p.2 @a.-1:-2:0:1').replace(/\s/g, ',') + ',' + $2('.sub_r p.1 @a').replace(/\s/g, ','); k = ''; t = $2('.date').replace(/最近更新：|\s.*/g, ''); reg = book.name + '：'; l = list[list.length - 1].chapter_name; l = String(l); l = Get('settle') == true ? l.replace(reg, '').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, l.match(/\d+/) ? l.match(/(\d+)/)[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : l; Setting = '\n📌当前源站：' + (Get('ci0') == 0 ? '〖默认〗' : '〖自选〗') + x[Get('ci0')] + (Get('url').length > 26 ? Get('url').substring(0, 26) + "
" + Get('url').substring(26) : Get('url')) + ('\n🔍繁体搜索：' + (Get('search_TC') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')) + ('\n📑简繁转换：' + (Get('TC_to_SC') == true ? '〖默认〗开启' : '〖自选〗关闭')) + ('\n🗃目录整理：' + (Get('settle') == true ? '〖自选〗开启' : '〖默认〗关闭')); changeLog = '\nㅤ\nㅤ\n' + Setting + '\nㅤ\n'; book = JSON.stringify({ 'name': $2('#comicName'), 'author': $2('.pd.introName').replace(/[,xX\s&]|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/^\//g, ''), 'kind': s + ',' + k, 'word': '', 'latest': l + '〔' + t + '〕', 'intro': (t != '' ? ('更新时间：' + t + '\nㅤ\n') : '') + $2('.txtDesc.autoHeight').replace(/介绍[:：]/g, '').replace(/(^)/g, '$1
') + changeLog, 'cover': Get('url') + $3('.pic img'), 'url': url, 'durl': '', 'reName': true }); } else { (function Book() { apiBaseUrl = cache.get(`cache_api_${Get('url')}`); json = java.ajax(apiBaseUrl); Title = JSON.parse(json)['title']; Intro = JSON.parse(json)['intro']; return { Title: Title, Intro: Intro }; }()); book = JSON.stringify({ 'kind': book['kind'], 'latest': Title[Title.length - 1], 'intro': Intro[0] }); } Put(book);

if (result.includes("qyyuapi.com")) {
    var data = [];
    for (i = 2; i <= 6; i++) {
        data.push(baseUrl + '/' + i);
    }
    data;
}

var User = '';
var Title = '';
var Link = '';
var Intro = '';
user_Check();
var data = [];
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(Get('url') + "headers").replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
if (User == true) {
    var list =  JSON.parse(result).data.comics;
    for (i in list) {
        var hot = list[i].stat !== undefined ? ('♥ ' + list[i].stat.hot + ',第' + list[i].ranknum + '名') : '';
        var tags = list[i].tags !== undefined ? list[i].tags.replace(/\s/g, ',') : '';
        var latest = list[i].latestVolume !== undefined && list[i].latestVolume.title !== undefined ? list[i].latestVolume.title : '';
        data.push({
            'name': list[i].title,
            'author': list[i].authorstr.replace(/[,xX&\s]|(amp;)|[图文][:：]/g, '/').replace(/\/+/g, '/').replace(/^[\/]/g, ''),
            'kind': hot + ',' + tags,
            'word': '',
            'latest': latest + '〔' + list[i].last_volpub_time.replace(/\s.*/g, '') + '〕',
            'intro': '',
            'cover': Get('url') + list[i].cover,
            'url': Get('url') + '/comic/' + list[i].id
        });
    }
    var next = java.ajax(baseUrl.replace(/-(\d+)$/, function(match, p1) {return '-' + (parseInt(p1) + 1);}) + ',' + JSON.stringify(Option));
    if (!list[0] || !JSON.parse(next).data.comics[0]) {
        Data();
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data();
}
Put(data);
</js>

    "headers": Headers
};
if (String(book['author']) !== "xiaohan231") {
    var list = JSON.parse(result.match(/initIntroData\(\[(.*)\]\)/)[1]).data;
    date = String(java.getElements('.date').text()).replace(/最近更新：|\s.*/g, '');
    reg = book.name + '：';
    for (i in list) {
        title = list[i].chapter_name;
        title = title.replace(reg, '');
        order = title.match(/(\d+)/);
        title = Get('settle') == true ? String(title).replace(/(-|_|\s-\s)/g, ' ').replace(/\s-\s|-/g, ' ').replace(/\s+/, ' ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期](|\s)第.*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期][^\s]/, '$1 ').replace(/.*第(\d+)[话話章回期]\s\d+/, '$1').replace(/.*第.*(\d+).*?[话話章回期]/, '$1').replace(/(\d+)/, title.match(/\d+/) ? order[1].padStart(3, '0') : '$1') : title;
        data.push({
            'title': i == list.length - 1 ? title + '〔' + date + '〕' : title,
            'link': Get('url') + '/view/' + list[i].comic_id + '/' + list[i].id,
            'time': list[i].update_time
        });
    }
    data = JSON.stringify(data);
} else {
    data = Data1();
}
Put(data);
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
(function (e) {
    if (Get('search_TC') == true || e.indexOf('TC') > -1) {
        e = String(java.s2t(e)).replace(/TC/, '');
    }
    return Get('url') + '/search/' + e;
}(key));
</js>
